from meme_generator import get_meme

def main():
    meme = get_meme(red_in())
    result = meme(images=】【变量@images】【@, texts=】【变量@texts】【@, args={"circle": True,"horizontal": 】【随机取【数组@True@False】】【@,"character":】【取随机数@1@6】【@})
    red_out(result.getvalue())

main()

【隐藏【快速运行PY【@
import asyncio

from meme_generator import get_meme

async def main():
  meme = get_meme(red_in())
  result = await meme(images=】【变量@images】【@, texts=[], args=】【变量@args】【@)
  with open("】【文本替换【应用目录】data/【发送者ID】/result.gif@\\@/】【@", "wb") as f:
    f.write(result.getvalue())

loop = asyncio.new_event_loop()
loop.run_until_complete(main())

import asyncio

from meme_generator import get_meme

async def main():
  meme = get_meme("my_friend")
  result = await meme(images=】【文本替换@["【应用目录】data/【发送者ID】/1.gif"]@\\@/】【@, texts=】【转文本【变量@text】】【@, args={"name": "】【变量@name】【@"})
  with open("】【文本替换【应用目录】data/【发送者ID】/result.gif@\\@/】【@", "wb") as f:
    f.write(result.getvalue())

loop = asyncio.new_event_loop()
loop.run_until_complete(main())
